body: Bro, this shits difficult to follow

I agree to the 1st and 3rd comments. They should add NTR tag on it. Does it not count when it comes to yuri? And thats really fucked up mind too when its comes to touko liking her girlfriend getting fucked by others
Worth the wait for the translation
Ive been very confused after part two, but was invested enough to keep reading on. Congrats to those two.
Cute story even with the NTR. I hate the way he draws them though. Could you make them less sexy? Maybe it is designed for people on LSD XD
I love the art for being different, straightforward, expressive. And I've been looking for a yuri that wasn't just lovey dovey doe-eyed caressing for ages. My prayers have been answered
It's like a car crash that did multiple flips and barrel rolls and still somehow managed to parallel park.

The art is... well...
The story well I've seen better drama.
And I agree with the dude below me. Also Touko is kinda sick to get horny by seeing mio getting fcked by the others.

I have no idea if this can be called a "happy ending" or not like how the author said it would be. Since the whole premise of the story is that Juria has been in love with Rin since they were little kids and first met. But since their both girls Rin is hesitant about the whole thing seemingly thinking it's not right. So to "turn" Rin, Juria runs around and starts turning everyone into yuri and hooking up with girl after girl just to make Rin jealous and eventually turn yuri as well. Then the "happy ending" is that Juria has finally managed to turn everyone they know into Yuri and she and Rin get's together so happy ending! So the story is filled with manipulation, NTR, cheating and to some degree brain washing to eventually have Juria end up with Rin.
Noo im not pirating... Okay im sorry
